Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Nice spot to stop for Tapas.  We really enjoyed the tacos with guacamole, olives, BBQ chicken wings and cheese sticks.  The cheese sticks were filled with a gorgonzola type cheese.  Black and green olives with a few peppers were quite nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Excellent tapas spot with top notch service and a fun vibe. The food is delicious and there are great choices for tapas. Our sever was very attentive and made sure we were well taken care of. Fair prices I would say as well (our party of 3 total bill was ‚Ç¨70).

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: The place has great style, the staff was lovely and the food was simply great! From the entr√©e olives to the garlic mushrooms, everything tasted amazing. One of the best pan con tomate that I've ever had. And the wine was delicious too! I will definitely come back.

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Castillo was a wonderful experience.  The wait staff is wonderful. The food fresh and delicious. The adult beverages were top notch. The dishes we had were shrimp, potatoes, avocados, and more each one wonderful.

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Cozy atmospheric interior, dated in a way I like! Unfortunately the food Used to be better‚Ä¶ when I came here in 2018. I recall being very pleasantly surprised at such a tourist street restaurant being good. Now the quality has gone down ‚Ä¶

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Super hospitable host, fast service and tremendous tapas. Seriously, my wife and I went in to have a fast bite to eat because we brought our baby, but we had a super time. Especially the fish "croquettas" are fantastic! And the sangria, and the Iberico, and the vibe!

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Changed my order according to the waiter's 'recommendation' but the tenderest steak in their menu is not as tender as I ate. Don't feel like paying for the price. Agree with one of the review, the steak is kinda under seasoned. I saw other customer keep on adding salt too.

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text:

Rest was a mountain of meat, served without style. Nothing to remember.

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: The service was really good. The food was mediocre in presentation and taste. I heard good things about their red meat, but I went with grilled salmon, which was kind of ok. Salads were not very fresh. And fries were forgettable.

Name: Argentijns Steakhouse Castillo
Review Text: Decent food, it's not the best Indian I ever had but totally ok. Service was also ok. They where alert but food took some time. I ordered a menu with soup starter, mixed tali and dessert. I paid about 18 euro.
